#InventoryEdit activity.

= Introduction =

Edit and insert individual ingredients in the inventory.


= Details =

Use the InventoryEdit activity to insert or edit ingredients that you keep in the cupboard or use in recipes. The data that can be entered in this activity is:

||*Field Name*||*Description*||
||Ingredient||The name of the ingredient||
||Quantity||The quantity that is currently in the cupboard||
||Unit||The units that quantity is measured in e.g. Cans, Jars, Litres||
||Minimum Quantity||The minimum quantity of this ingredient that you like to keep in the cupboard||
